i mean they looked like a couple of lesbians raising their daughter together
summary: Ok so captain marvel wasn't what i was expecting. It felt a lot like if star wars wasn't set in a galaxy far far away but i...
body:
Ok so captain marvel wasn’t what i was expecting. It felt a lot like if star wars wasn’t set in a galaxy far far away but i guess that’s what happens when you have movie with a pilot from another planet produced by disney… Otherwise it was pretty fun, carol is a badass ray of sunshine and it was refreshing seeing a cocky, confident, funny female hero with no love interest. Her relationship with fury is the best, coulson has always been a fanboy and goose deserves its own movie.

Also bonus points for the post credit scene, the soundtrack and the fashion.

summary: I’m too tired and stressed to give a full review here but let me just say this, Captain Marvel is awesome! I wasn’t actually...
body:
I’m too tired and stressed to give a full review here but let me just say this,

Captain Marvel is awesome!

I wasn’t actually that hyped beforehand but we got the chance to go see it today before our moving hell started and I’m very glad we did. Wasn’t that sold on the trailer but Brie won me over completely in the movie, I also really enjoyed seeing a young Fury, the soundtrack was cool, there were some funny moments and surprises and I left the theatre with the same feeling I had after watching Wonder woman: fucking powerful.

My husband really enjoyed it too and was shocked when he saw the low score on Imdb, I explained him how certain men hated the movie even before it got released so he gave it an extra high score “to go against those assholes” :)

Oh, there was a special intro logo with Stan Lee, instant goosebumps.

And post credit scene spoiler:

I wasn’t ready to see my Steve on the big screen! Oh my lord, I actually gasped “Stevie” when he came on (which made my husband roll his eyes) 

I’m sooo ready for Endgame now.

summary: I just got out of Captain Marvel and let me tell you that this movie is fucking epic ! I’m in love with Carol Danvers and...
body:
I just got out of Captain Marvel and let me tell you that this movie is fucking epic !

I’m in love with Carol Danvers and everything she stands for and represents. And I’m in love with Brie Larson who incarnates her so perfectly. And finally I’m in love with the entire movie that made me feel so powerful, as a woman, and will do the same for a lot of girls and women around the world.

Thank you Captain Marvel !

summary:
I went to see Captain Marvel today and oh my god can I marry Brie Larson?
This is a movie I needed to see as a girl and I almost...
body:
I went to see Captain Marvel today and oh my god can I marry Brie Larson?

This is a movie I needed to see as a girl and I almost cry at the “I don’t need to prove you anything” line (or sthg like that), thinking of all the little girls that will be able to identify to Carol and hell yes it is worth watching!
